Business IT Support, IP Telephony & Systems Management in Sussex. Viper IT is a customer-focused IT Solutions Provider combined with a full service Web Design & online service agency based in Shoreham, West Sussex. We provide a full range of IT services including Business IT Support, Systems Management and Network installation to small and medium businesses in Brighton and Hove.
With the growth of our online services we also servicing an increasing number of foreign clients in America and parts of Europe.
